org.jruyi.io

Interface ISetShortEncoder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IShortCodec

    public interface ISetShortEncoder
    Encodes a short to a chain of buffer units.
    Since:
    2.5

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void set(short s, IUnitChain unitChain, int index)
      Encodes the specified short value s and sets the resultant bytes to the specified unitChain starting at the specified index in the current unit.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        void set(short s,
       IUnitChain unitChain,
       int index)
        Encodes the specified short value s and sets the resultant bytes to the specified unitChain starting at the specified index in the current unit.
        Parameters:
        s - the short value to be encoded
        unitChain - the unit chain where the encoded bytes to be set to
        index - the offset of the first byte in the current unit to be set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of bounds
